position.marginalia_text: What man[ner] of evell [that] eu[er] thow be / on goddys behalfe I co[n]iure the / I co[n]iure the with the blessyd crosse that Jhc [=Jesus] was done one with fforse / I co[n]iure the with the nayls this thre [that] Jhc [=Jesus] was done apon the tre / I co[n]iure the with the crowne of thorne [that] on Jhc [=Jesus] heyd was done ffor skorne / I co[n]iure the with the blessyd bloode that Jhc bleyd on the Rode / I co[n]iure the with the wounds ffyve [that] Jhc [=Jesus] suffurt in his lyve I co[n]iure the with the wholye spere [that] longins tyll his hart can bere / yet I co[n]iure the neu[er] the lasse with all the vertues of the masse /

in honore b[ea]t[a]e mari[a]e et b[ea]ti batolphi et s[an]ct[a]e apoloni[a]e et sanct[a]e petronill[a]e et quinq[ue] p[ate]r n[oste]r et quinq[ue] aue maria et vnu[m] credo / wel/machabeus [?] [?] q[ui]b[us] [?] [?] Wed helfe cryste helpe
Euforbium / pelitorie of speane stavysacur

marginalia.translation:
In honour of blessed Mary and blessed Botolph and Saint Apollonius and Saint Petronille, and five Pater Nosters and five Ave Marias and one Credo /
Euphorbium. Pellitory of Spain. Stavesacre.
